newsitem.title: UK: NWE oil products holding steady to firming slightl.
newsitem.headline: NWE oil products holding steady to firming slightl.

text.p: NWE oil products were steady to firmer on Wednesday, traders said.
Gasoline prices were steady to slightly firmer with barges supported by short covering while bullish U.S. data strengthened NYMEX unleaded futures and underpinned cargo prices.
Naphtha held steady in quiet trade underpinned by firmer futures but with physical demand staying relaxed.
Fuel oil gained $1, but a bearish cloud looms over the summer market with Russian supply set to be high.
Gas oil was pulled $1 higher by stronger futures and steady premiums, but activity was thin.
